Dear/ Colleague;
/ Kt the Annual Meeting of the American Council on Education in
Ch^pago on October 3-5, 1962, the delegates voted unanimously to adopt
the revised Constitution and Bylaws. Copies of the revision had been
sent to the voting members on August 27, and copies were distributed at
the business session of the Annual Meeting.
The new Constitution and Bylaws provide for three classes of
members and for an affiliate group. Definitions of the classifications
are enclosed, together with listings of the groups as approved by the
Board of Directors. You will note that your organization has been
classified as a Constituent Organization Member of the Council,
Your organization is entitled to two subscriptions to each of the
Council's periodicals: The Educational Record (quarterly), and Higher
Education and National Affairs (a news bulletin issued 35-40 times a
year). We assume that you would wish to have these two copies addressed
(1) to you as the executive officer and (2) to the president or chairman
of your organization, A reply card is enclosed for your convenience in
supplying these two names for subscription lists.
A brief report of the Annual Meeting was published in the
Council's Bulletin (Vol. XI, No. 33, October 10, 1962). The principal
addresses will be published in a volume to be distributed to Council
members early in January.
On behalf of the Board of Directors and the officers of the
Council, I express warm appreciation of your support for the program
of the Council,
Sincerely yours,
Logan Wilson
